titles.title: Incentivizing Investment and Job Creation in Opportunity Zones Act of 2019
To incentivize manufacturers to relocate production to Opportunity Zones in the United States, and for other purposes.
Incentivizing Investment and Job Creation in Opportunity Zones Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Incentivizing Investment and Job Creation in Opportunity Zones Act of 2019
This bill directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection to refund to entities that own or operate one or more manufacturing facilities in a qualified opportunity zone certain duties on imports
